title: Brewery Finder
description: An application that will allow you to search for breweries by state and brewery type. Uses Yelp and Google maps to give you more information about that brewery.

title: Slurp-Da-Soup
description: An application that uses a database to store information and pull information. You can type in the name of a soup and transfer the soup to slurped by a button click. Deployed on Heroku.

title: Stream-Saver
description: An application that lets the user search and save to a watch list any show or movie they'd like to stream. Uses Express-js, MySQL, and Passport.

title: Work Day Scheduler
description: An application that is a nine to five work day scheduler that displays the current time and gives the user a visual experience on what time it is by color coding the past, present and future.

title: Password Generator
description: An application that will prompt you with a series of questions to generate a random password that is displayed on the screen.

title: Weather Dashboard
description: An application that can take in a city and display the current weather. It will also give you the five day forecast and save searched cities in local storage.

title: API Quiz
description: An application that will take you through 10 questions of JavaScript trivia and will log your score in local storage with a name attached to it. The score is based on how much time you had left and questions answered right.
